processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: Your top-level steps are correct: input, initialize, loop, and output; check that you will test each number inside the loop.
Decide loop details: iterate i from 1 up to the input, use a condition to identify divisors, and accumulate them into the sum.
Now turn each comment into statements: create a sum variable, read the integer, write a for-loop that checks divisibility and adds divisors to sum, then print the sum.
